reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide updates every three months to the Committee regarding its activities
summary:
19. Recalls that individuals and entities planning, sponsoring or participating in attacks against UNAMID personnel may meet designation criteria.

20. Insists that the Government of Sudan remove restrictions on the Panel of Experts' work and enhance cooperation.

21. Urges the Government of Sudan to respond to Committee requests on measures to protect civilians, investigations, and accountability.

22. Welcomes the Committee's work and urges all States and parties to cooperate fully with the Committee and Panel of Experts.

23. Requests the Panel of Experts to coordinate with UNAMID and other Panels or Groups of Experts.

24. Requests the Panel of Experts to assess progress towards reducing violations and provide information on individuals and entities meeting listing criteria.

25. Reaffirms the Committee's mandate to encourage dialogue with interested Member States.

26. Emphasizes the importance of regular consultations with concerned Member States.

27. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
